subject: Art & Design
title: Color Harmony in Interior Design
description: One-minute skill: Color Harmony in Interior Design.

hook.text: Paint one wall of a small room dark. Suddenly the room feels larger. Color reshapes space.

buildup.text: Interior designers use the 60-30-10 rule: dominant color, secondary color, accent color.

discovery.text: Light colors open up small rooms. Dark colors make large rooms feel intimate and cozy.

twist.text: Natural light shifts throughout the day. A perfect wall color at noon can look terrible at dusk.

climax.text: Always test paint samples on the actual wall â€” screens and swatches lie under different lighting.

punchline.text: Don't pick colors from a screen. Pick them from the room.
